title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 479.11 - Resignation after charges have been served
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 479.11 - Resignation after charges have been served

State Regulations

An accused member who resigns after charges have been served
upon him shall not be entitled to compensation for vacation and/or overtime
accruals, except as may be approved by the superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
479.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
